code: var baseURL=process.env.baseURL||"https://nc-news-shaq.herokuapp.com/";var axios=require("axios").create({baseURL:baseURL});export var getArticles=function getArticles(){return axios.get("/api/articles").then(function(_ref){var data=_ref.data;return data.articles;});};export var getSingleArticle=function getSingleArticle(article_id){return axios.get("/api/articles/"+article_id).then(function(_ref2){var data=_ref2.data;return data.article;});};
